verbs.description: [ARG0: Governor Paul LePage] [V: says] [ARG1: he will send the Maine National Guard to the U.S .- Mexico border if asked by the Trump administration] .
Governor Paul LePage says he [V: will] send the Maine National Guard to the U.S .- Mexico border if asked by the Trump administration .
Governor Paul LePage says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: send] [ARG1: the Maine National Guard] [ARG2: to the U.S .- Mexico border] [ARGM-ADV: if asked by the Trump administration] .
Governor Paul LePage says he will send the Maine National Guard to the U.S .- Mexico border if [V: asked] [ARG0: by the Trump administration] .
